properties.areaDesc: Rockingham, NC; Caswell, NC; Pittsylvania, VA; City of Danville, VA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 2:23PM EST until February 9 at 11:25AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County

Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell...Rockingham...City of
Danville and Pittsylvania Counties

Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County

Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County

Several inches of rain fell across the region yesterday into
this morning. Excessive runoff continues across the region
resulting in minor to moderate flooding along the Roanoke
River and its tributaries.

* Flood Warning for
the Dan River at Danville
* through Sunday morning.
* At 2 PM EST this afternoon the stage was 26.5 feet and nearly
steady.
* Flood Stage is 21.0 feet. Moderate flood stage is 26.0 feet.
Major flood stage is 32.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring AND Moderate flooding is forecast
to continue.
* The river will continue rising to near 27.4 feet this evening...
then begin to fall slowly.
* Impact...at 26.0 feet...Flood water begins to affect the Danville
Utilities Complex and the Public Works complex,
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to noaa weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
